The Ultimate Destination Wedding

Seeking romance with a beautiful backdrop only Hawaii can offer? Couples travel from all over the world to make a commitment to one another in a place that radiates love, or what we call, aloha. We are happy to provide exceptional accommodations for your wedding in stunning Waikiki, a place known for its dreamy landscape, aquamarine water, and white sand beach. A Waikiki wedding is perfect for your intimate ceremony or a gathering for friends and family near and far.

Your destination wedding in paradise starts with an outstanding hotel. Our central location, convenient amenities, and affordable rates will provide you and your guests with a stress-free and comfortable stay in Waikiki.
